member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.Identifier
member.summary: Unique identifier for this API endpoint.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Number of milliseconds to wait before considering the request to be timed out. Default is 60 seconds.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.IncludeAuthContextHeader
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether or not the auth context header should be included for authenticated requests.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.LogRequestFull
member.summary: True to enable logging of the full request.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.LogRequestBody
member.summary: True to log the request body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.LogResponseBody
member.summary: True to log the response body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.MaxRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size. Default is 512MB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.UseGlobalBlockedHeaders
member.summary: True to use global blocked headers. Headers in the global blocked headers will not be forwarded from incoming requests to origin servers.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.AuthContextHeader
member.summary: Header to add when passing authentication context to an origin server. When set, the entire AuthenticationResult object will be JSON serialized and base64 encoded, and passed to the origin server using this header.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.BlockedHeaders
member.summary: Explicit list of blocked headers. These headers are not forwarded from incoming requests to origin servers.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.RewriteUrls
member.summary: Key is the upper-case HTTP method. Value is a dictionary where the key is the original URL and the value is the URL to which the request should be directed.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.OpenApiDocumentation
member.summary: OpenAPI documentation metadata for routes in this endpoint. Optional - if not provided, minimal documentation is auto-generated.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.CaptureRequestBody
member.summary: Enable capture of request body for this endpoint. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.CaptureResponseBody
member.summary: Enable capture of response body for this endpoint. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.CaptureRequestHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of request headers for this endpoint. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.CaptureResponseHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of response headers for this endpoint. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.MaxCaptureRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size to capture in bytes. Default is 64KB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpoint.MaxCaptureResponseBodySize
member.summary: Maximum response body size to capture in bytes. Default is 64KB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.ApiEndpointGroup.ParameterizedUrls
member.summary: Key is the upper-case HTTP method. Value is a list of parameterized URLs to match, e.g. /{version}/foo/bar/{id}.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.AuthContext.Metadata
member.summary: User-assignable metadata, useful for passing context to and from your application and Switchboard. This object must be serializable to JSON.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.AuthContext.FailureMessage
member.summary: Message to provide to the user in the event that authentication or authorization was not successful.

member.name: M:Switchboard.Core.AuthContext.FromBase64String(System.String)
member.summary: Return a populated authentication result object from a supplied base64 string.

member.name: M:Switchboard.Core.AuthContext.TryFromBase64String(System.String,Switchboard.Core.AuthContext@)
member.summary: Try to parse a base64 string into an authentication context.

member.name: M:Switchboard.Core.AuthContext.ToBase64String
member.summary: Create a base64 representation of the authentication context.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.AuthenticationContext.Metadata
member.summary: User-assignable metadata, useful for passing context to and from your application and Switchboard. This object must be serializable to JSON.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.AuthorizationContext.Metadata
member.summary: User-assignable metadata, useful for passing context to and from your application and Switchboard. This object must be serializable to JSON.

member.summary: Create a base64 representation of the authentication result.

member.summary: Return a populated authentication result object from a supplied base64 string.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.MatchingApiEndpoint.AuthRequired
member.summary: Boolean indicating if the endpoint requires authentication.

member.name: T:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig
member.summary: API endpoint configuration. This class contains only configuration data that is stored in the database. Runtime state is maintained separately in ApiEndpointState. Routes and origin mappings are stored in separate tables.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.GUID
member.summary: Unique GUID for this API endpoint.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.Identifier
member.summary: Unique identifier for this API endpoint. Primary key.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.Name
member.summary: Display name for this API endpoint.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Number of milliseconds to wait before considering the request to be timed out. Default is 60 seconds.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.MaxRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size in bytes. Default is 512MB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.LogRequestFull
member.summary: True to enable logging of the full request.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.LogRequestBody
member.summary: True to log the request body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.LogResponseBody
member.summary: True to log the response body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.IncludeAuthContextHeader
member.summary: Boolean indicating whether or not the auth context header should be included for authenticated requests.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.AuthContextHeader
member.summary: Header to add when passing authentication context to an origin server.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.UseGlobalBlockedHeaders
member.summary: True to use global blocked headers.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.CaptureRequestBody
member.summary: Enable capture of request body for this endpoint. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.CaptureResponseBody
member.summary: Enable capture of response body for this endpoint. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.CaptureRequestHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of request headers for this endpoint. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.CaptureResponseHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of response headers for this endpoint. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.MaxCaptureRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size to capture in bytes. Default is 64KB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointConfig.MaxCaptureResponseBodySize

member.summary: Timestamp when this record was last modified.

member.name: T:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointState

member.summary: Last-used index for round-robin load balancing.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointState.TotalRequests
member.summary: Total requests processed by this endpoint.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointState.FailedRequests
member.summary: Total failed requests (4xx or 5xx status codes).

member.name: M:Switchboard.Core.Models.ApiEndpointState.GetNextIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get and increment the last index atomically for round-robin.

member.summary: Globally blocked header. Headers in this table are not forwarded from incoming requests to origin servers.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.BlockedHeader.CreatedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when this record was created.

member.summary: Unique identifier for this credential. Primary key.

member.summary: Display name for this credential (e.g., "API Token 1", "CLI Access").

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.Description
member.summary: Description of what this token is used for.

member.summary: Bearer token value. This should only be shown once when created.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.BearerTokenHash
member.summary: SHA256 hash of the bearer token. Used for lookup and validation without storing the plain token.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.Active
member.summary: True if this credential is active.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.IsReadOnly
member.summary: True if this credential is read-only and cannot be modified via API or dashboard.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.CreatedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when this credential was created.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.ExpiresUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when this credential expires. Null means no expiration.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.LastUsedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when this credential was last used.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.ModifiedUtc
member.summary: Timestamp when this credential was last modified.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.IsExpired
member.summary: True if this credential has expired.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.Credential.IsValid
member.summary: True if this credential is valid (active and not expired).

member.summary: True if this route requires authentication.

member.name: T:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig
member.summary: Origin server configuration. This class contains only configuration data that is stored in the database. Runtime state is maintained separately in OriginServerState.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.GUID
member.summary: Unique GUID for this origin server.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.Identifier
member.summary: Unique identifier for this origin server. Primary key.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.Name
member.summary: Display name for this origin server.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.HealthCheckIntervalMs
member.summary: Interval at which health is checked against this origin. Default is 5 seconds (5000). Minimum is 1 second (1000).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.HealthCheckMethod
member.summary: HTTP method to use when performing a healthcheck. Default is HEAD.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.HealthCheckUrl
member.summary: URL to use when performing a healthcheck. Default is /.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.UnhealthyThreshold
member.summary: Number of consecutive failed health checks before marking an origin as unhealthy. Default is 2.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.HealthyThreshold
member.summary: Number of consecutive successful health checks before marking an origin as healthy. Default is 1.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.MaxParallelRequests
member.summary: Maximum number of parallel requests to this backend. Default is 10.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.RateLimitRequestsThreshold
member.summary: Threshold at which 429 rate limit responses are sent. Default is 30.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.LogRequest
member.summary: True to log requests to this origin.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.LogRequestBody
member.summary: True to log the request body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.LogResponse
member.summary: True to log responses from this origin.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.LogResponseBody
member.summary: True to log the response body.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.CaptureRequestBody
member.summary: Enable capture of request body for this origin. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.CaptureResponseBody
member.summary: Enable capture of response body for this origin. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.CaptureRequestHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of request headers for this origin. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.CaptureResponseHeaders
member.summary: Enable capture of response headers for this origin. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.MaxCaptureRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size to capture in bytes. Default is 64KB.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Models.OriginServerConfig.MaxCaptureResponseBodySize
member.summary: Maximum response body size to capture in bytes. Default is 64KB.

member.summary: Timestamp when this record was created.

member.summary: Timestamp when this record was last modified.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.ConnectionString
member.summary: Connection string. If provided, this takes precedence over individual connection parameters.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.Filename
member.summary: Database file path (for SQLite only). Default is "sb.db".

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.Hostname
member.summary: Database hostname (for MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.Port
member.summary: Database port. Default values: MySQL=3306, PostgreSQL=5432, SQL Server=1433.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.Ssl
member.summary: Enable SSL/TLS for database connection. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.DatabaseSettings.TrustServerCertificate
member.summary: Trust server certificate (for SSL connections). Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.ManagementSettings.Enable
member.summary: Enable or disable the Management API. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.ManagementSettings.BasePath
member.summary: Base path for the Management API. Default is /_sb/v1.0/.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.ManagementSettings.AdminToken
member.summary: Admin bearer token for authentication. Default is "sbadmin".

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.ManagementSettings.RequireAuthentication
member.summary: True to require authentication for all management endpoints. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.Enable
member.summary: Enable or disable OpenAPI document generation. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.EnableSwaggerUi
member.summary: Enable or disable Swagger UI. Default is true when OpenAPI is enabled.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.DocumentPath
member.summary: Path to serve the OpenAPI JSON document. Default is "/openapi.json".

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.SwaggerUiPath
member.summary: Path to serve the Swagger UI. Default is "/swagger".

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.Title
member.summary: API title for the OpenAPI document.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.Version
member.summary: API version for the OpenAPI document.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.Description
member.summary: API description for the OpenAPI document.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiDocumentSettings.SecuritySchemes
member.summary: Security schemes available for the API. Key is the scheme name (e.g., "bearerAuth").

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiSecuritySchemeSettings.Type
member.summary: Type of security scheme (apiKey, http, oauth2, openIdConnect).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiSecuritySchemeSettings.Name
member.summary: Name of the header, query, or cookie parameter (for apiKey type).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiSecuritySchemeSettings.In
member.summary: Location of the API key (query, header, cookie) for apiKey type.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiSecuritySchemeSettings.Scheme
member.summary: HTTP authorization scheme (bearer, basic, etc.) for http type.

member.name: T:Switchboard.Core.Settings.OpenApiTagSettings
member.summary: OpenAPI tag settings for grouping operations.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.Enable
member.summary: Enable or disable request history capture. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.CaptureRequestBody
member.summary: Capture request body. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.CaptureResponseBody
member.summary: Capture response body. Default is false.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.CaptureRequestHeaders
member.summary: Capture request headers. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.CaptureResponseHeaders
member.summary: Capture response headers. Default is true.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.MaxRequestBodySize
member.summary: Maximum request body size to capture in bytes. Bodies larger than this are not captured. Default is 65536 (64KB).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.MaxResponseBodySize
member.summary: Maximum response body size to capture in bytes. Bodies larger than this are not captured. Default is 65536 (64KB).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.RetentionDays
member.summary: Retention period in days. Records older than this are automatically deleted. Default is 7 days. Set to 0 for no retention limit.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.MaxRecords
member.summary: Maximum number of records to retain. When exceeded, oldest records are deleted. Default is 100000. Set to 0 for no limit.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.RequestHistorySettings.CleanupIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Cleanup interval in seconds. How often to run the retention cleanup. Default is 3600 (1 hour).

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.Settings.SyslogServer.RandomizePorts
member.summary: Boolean to indicate whether or not randomized port numbers should be used. If false, the value in 'Port' will be used.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardCallbacks.AuthenticateAndAuthorize
member.summary: Authenticate and authorize a request. This method will pass to your application an HttpContextBase object. Your application should return a populated AuthContext object.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardDaemon.Client
member.summary: Switchboard client for database operations. Use this to seed or manage data programmatically.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardSettings.BlockedHeaders

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardSettings.Database
member.summary: Database configuration settings. Enable to store configuration in database instead of JSON file.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardSettings.Management
member.summary: Management API settings. Enable to expose REST API for configuration management.

member.name: P:Switchboard.Core.SwitchboardSettings.RequestHistory
member.summary: Request history capture settings. Enable to capture and store request/response history.
